pages.text: Turn rotten flesh into rotten leather.
Craft a wood rack, place it on a wall and hang your rotten leather onto it.$(br2)It takes 18000 ticks / 15 min to turn into hide.
Creatures drop hide instead of leather.$(br)You also get hide from rotten leather.
Prepare hides before you hang them onto the rack again.$(br2)It takes 12000 ticks / 10 min to turn into leather.
You can also craft leather from various sources.$(br)$(li)Rabbit Hide x4$(li)Lether Stripe x3$(li)Orc Skin x2$(li)Rotten Flesh x6 (only in the cooking pot)
